trans-unit.source: Represents a vector that is used to encode three-dimensional physical rotations.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个用于对三维物理旋转进行编码的向量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> structure is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>结构用于有效地旋转对象 （x，y，z） 有关向量的角度 theta，其中：

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The vector part of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数的向量部分。

trans-unit.source: The rotation part of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数的旋转部分。

trans-unit.source: Creates a quaternion from the specified vector and rotation parts.
trans-unit.target: 从指定向量和旋转部分创建四元数。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the X component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给四元数的 X 分量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the Y component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给四元数的 Y 分量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the Z component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给四元数的 Z 分量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the W component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给四元数的 W 分量的值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a quaternion from the specified components.
trans-unit.target: 从指定分量构造四元数。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Adds each element in one quaternion with its corresponding element in a second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 将一个四元数中的每个元素与第二个四元数中的对应元素相加。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion that contains the summed values of <paramref name="value1" /> and <paramref name="value2" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <paramref name="value1" /> 和 <paramref name="value2" /> 的总和值的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion rotation in the series.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的第一个四元数旋转。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion rotation in the series.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的第二个四元数旋转。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates two quaternions.
trans-unit.target: 连接两个四元数。

trans-unit.source: A new quaternion representing the concatenation of the <paramref name="value1" /> rotation followed by the <paramref name="value2" /> rotation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新四元数，表示 <paramref name="value1" /> 旋转后跟 <paramref name="value2" /> 旋转的连接。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the conjugate of a specified quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定四元数的共轭。

trans-unit.source: A new quaternion that is the conjugate of <see langword="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see langword="value" /> 的共轭的新四元数。

trans-unit.source: The unit vector to rotate around.
trans-unit.target: 要围绕其旋转的单位向量。

trans-unit.source: The angle, in radians, to rotate around the vector.
trans-unit.target: 用于围绕向量旋转的角度（以弧度表示）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a quaternion from a unit vector and an angle to rotate around the vector.
trans-unit.target: 从一个单位向量以及围绕该向量旋转的角度创建四元数。

trans-unit.source: The newly created quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的四元数。

trans-unit.source: `axis` vector must be normalized before calling this method or the resulting <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> will be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: `axis` 必须在调用此方法或生成之前规范化向量<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>会不正确。

trans-unit.source: The rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 旋转矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Creates a quaternion from the specified rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 从指定旋转矩阵创建四元数。

trans-unit.source: The newly created quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The yaw angle, in radians, around the Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 绕 Y 轴旋转的角度（以弧度表示）。

trans-unit.source: The pitch angle, in radians, around the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 绕 X 轴旋转的角度（以弧度表示）。

trans-unit.source: The roll angle, in radians, around the Z axis.
trans-unit.target: 绕 Z 轴旋转的角度（以弧度表示）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new quaternion from the given yaw, pitch, and roll.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的绕 Y 轴旋转、绕 X 轴旋转和绕 Z 轴旋转创建新四元数。

trans-unit.source: The resulting quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 生成的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The dividend.
trans-unit.target: 被除数。

trans-unit.source: The divisor.
trans-unit.target: 除数。

trans-unit.source: Divides one quaternion by a second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 将一个四元数除以第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion that results from dividing <paramref name="value1" /> by <paramref name="value2" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <paramref name="value1" /> 除以 <paramref name="value2" /> 得到的结果四元数。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the dot product of two quaternions.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个四元数的点积。

trans-unit.source: The dot product.
trans-unit.target: 点积。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and a specified <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> instance or a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定 <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> 实例或指定对象相等。

trans-unit.source: The other quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 另一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and another quaternion are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与另一个四元数相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two quaternions are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个四元数相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two quaternions are equal if each of their corresponding components is equal.
trans-unit.target: 每个其相应的组件是否相等，则两个四元数相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current instance and <paramref name="obj" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" /><see langword="" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例与 <paramref name="obj" /> 相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" /><see langword="" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="obj" /> is <see langword="null" />, the method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则此方法返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `obj` are equal if `obj` is a <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> object and the corresponding components of each matrix are equal.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例和`obj`相等如果`obj`是<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象和相应组件的每个矩阵相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code.
trans-unit.target: 哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a quaternion that represents no rotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示无旋转的四元数。

trans-unit.source: A quaternion whose values are <c>(0, 0, 0, 1)</c>.
trans-unit.target: 其值是一个四元数<c>（0，0，0，1）</c>。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of a quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 返回四元数的逆。

trans-unit.source: The inverted quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 求逆后的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current instance is the identity quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示当前实例是否为 Identity 四元数的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current instance is the identity quaternion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例是 Identity 四元数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the length of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 计算四元数的长度。

trans-unit.source: The computed length of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数的计算长度。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the squared length of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 计算四元数的长度平方值。

trans-unit.source: The length squared of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数的长度平方值。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The relative weight of <c>quaternion2</c> in the interpolation.
trans-unit.target: <c>quaternion2</c> 在内插中的相对权重。

trans-unit.source: Performs a linear interpolation between two quaternions based on a value that specifies the weighting of the second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定第二个四元数的权重的值在两个四元数之间执行线性内插。

trans-unit.source: The interpolated quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 内插的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Performs a multiplication operation on a quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 对四元数执行乘法运算。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the quaternion that results from multiplying two quaternions together.
trans-unit.target: 返回将两个四元数相乘得到的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The product quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 乘积四元数。

trans-unit.source: The source quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 源四元数。

trans-unit.source: The scalar value.
trans-unit.target: 标量值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the quaternion that results from scaling all the components of a specified quaternion by a scalar factor.
trans-unit.target: 返回按标量系数缩放指定四元数的所有分量后得到的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The scaled quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 缩放的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion to negate.
trans-unit.target: 要求反的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sign of each component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 反转四元数的每个分量的符号。

trans-unit.source: The negated quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 求反后的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion to normalize.
trans-unit.target: 要规范化的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Divides each component of a specified <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> by its length.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Numerics.Quaternion" /> 的每个分量除以其长度。

trans-unit.source: The normalized quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 规范化的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Adds each element in one quaternion with its corresponding element in a second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 将一个四元数中的每个元素与第二个四元数中的对应元素相加。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion that contains the summed values of <paramref name="value1" /> and <paramref name="value2" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <paramref name="value1" /> 和 <paramref name="value2" /> 的总和值的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Addition%2A> method defines the operaton of the addition operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Addition%2A>方法定义的加法运算符操作<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The dividend.
trans-unit.target: 被除数。

trans-unit.source: The divisor.
trans-unit.target: 除数。

trans-unit.source: Divides one quaternion by a second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 将一个四元数除以第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion that results from dividing <paramref name="value1" /> by <paramref name="value2" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <paramref name="value1" /> 除以 <paramref name="value2" /> 得到的结果四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Division%2A> method defines the division operation for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Division%2A>方法定义的除法运算<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two quaternions are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个四元数是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two quaternions are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个四元数相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two quaternions are equal if each of their corresponding components is equal.
trans-unit.target: 每个其相应的组件是否相等，则两个四元数相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Equality%2A> method defines the operation of the equality operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Equality%2A>方法定义的相等运算符的运算<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two quaternions are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个四元数是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value1" /> and <paramref name="value2" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value1" /> 和 <paramref name="value2" /> 不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs a multiplication operation on a quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 对四元数执行乘法运算。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the quaternion that results from multiplying two quaternions together.
trans-unit.target: 返回将两个四元数相乘得到的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The product quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 乘积四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Multiply%2A> method defines the operation of the multiplication operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Multiply%2A>方法定义的乘法运算符的运算<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The source quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 源四元数。

trans-unit.source: The scalar value.
trans-unit.target: 标量值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the quaternion that results from scaling all the components of a specified quaternion by a scalar factor.
trans-unit.target: 返回按标量系数缩放指定四元数的所有分量后得到的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The scaled quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 缩放的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Multiply%2A> method defines the operation of the multiplication operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Multiply%2A>方法定义的乘法运算符的运算<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts each element in a second quaternion from its corresponding element in a first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 从第一个四元数中的每个元素中减去第二个四元数中的对应元素。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion containing the values that result from subtracting each element in <paramref name="value2" /> from its corresponding element in <paramref name="value1" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含从 <paramref name="value1" /> 中的每个元素中减去 <paramref name="value2" /> 中的对应元素得到的值的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Subtraction%2A> method defines the operation of the subtraction operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_Subtraction%2A>方法定义的减法运算符，用于操作<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion to negate.
trans-unit.target: 要求反的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sign of each component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 反转四元数的每个分量的符号。

trans-unit.source: The negated quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 求反后的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_UnaryNegation%2A> method defines the operation of the unary negation operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion.op_UnaryNegation%2A>方法定义的一元求反运算符的运算<xref:System.Numerics.Quaternion>对象。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The relative weight of the second quaternion in the interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数在内插中的相对权重。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates between two quaternions, using spherical linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 使用球状线性内插，在两个四元数之间进行内插。

trans-unit.source: The interpolated quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 内插的四元数。

trans-unit.source: The first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第一个四元数。

trans-unit.source: The second quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 第二个四元数。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts each element in a second quaternion from its corresponding element in a first quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 从第一个四元数中的每个元素中减去第二个四元数中的对应元素。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion containing the values that result from subtracting each element in <paramref name="value2" /> from its corresponding element in <paramref name="value1" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含从 <paramref name="value1" /> 中的每个元素中减去 <paramref name="value2" /> 中的对应元素得到的值的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此四元数的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of this quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 此四元数的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的数字值设置格式的使用当前区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性，则返回的字符串可能显示为`{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`。

trans-unit.source: The rotation component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数的旋转分量。

trans-unit.source: The X value of the vector component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数向量分量的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: The Y value of the vector component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数向量分量的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The Z value of the vector component of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 四元数向量分量的 Z 值。
